orgverse:
नात्र कालो न युक्तो वा यस्य कालो न दृश्यते।
धर्मार्थश्च नियोगश्च सर्वशस्त्रार्थसाधकः॥
translation: Here, there is no concept of time or appropriateness that cannot be fulfilled. It is the place where righteousness, wealth, and duty are all brought to fruition by various scriptural injunctions.
